channel.title: Changing xp & putting items in shops
channel.description: ok, i was woundering if any one was willing help me with my problem i wanna change xp but dont know how anyone give me example and where to look & i been having problems with adding new items in shops i have no clur whats so ever if some on could tell me where look and what to do that would be great :P

item.title: Changing xp & putting items in shops
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

You could have searched thisâ€¦

To change xp rate.

Search

TotalExp =

And keep searching till you see something like

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
   TotalExp = (double) (50 * hitDiff);

Change the number higher to gain levels faster
and lower to gain them slower.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing xp & putting items in shops
